titleStmt.title: The old Parliament, with some passages thereof: as it was long since ordered, in the reigne of Alexander Severus, then Emperour of Rome: and of the proceedings therein, against Vetronius Turinus, a great favourite of the said emperour. Taken out of the Greeke records, and subscribed by the chiefe secretary, Eucolpius Cler. Alex. Imp. Published according to order.

The old Parliament, with some passages thereof: as it was long since ordered, in the reigne of Alexander Severus, then Emperour of Rome: and of the proceedings therein, against Vetronius Turinus, a great favourite of the said emperour. Taken out of the Greeke records, and subscribed by the chiefe secretary, Eucolpius Cler. Alex. Imp. Published according to order.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "March 24th 1644"; the 5 in imprint date is crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
